snippet: Although Ebola is new to the United States, the goal of contact tracing is the same in any disease: Track down those who could have been exposed.
lead_paragraph: Although Ebola is new to the United States, the goal of contact tracing is the same in any disease: Track down those who could have been exposed.

headline.main: Contact Tracing Is Called Pivotal in Fighting Ebola
